short_definition: The surrender by one state to another state of an individual accused or convicted of an offense outside its own territory and within the territorial jurisdiction of the other state, which, being competent to try and punish him, demands the surrender.
long_definition_html: The surrender by one state to another state of an individual accused or convicted of an offense outside its own territory and within the territorial jurisdiction of the other state, which, being competent to try and punish him, demands the surrender.
